description:
With microservices, polyglot and DevOps on the rise, where are we at with testing? Does it bring more complexity and make our testing effort harder or maybe in contrary; it actually helps us write better tests easier?

In this session, we will be exploring not only how we can do our testing in this new world, but also how the new world can help us test better.

Meet Arquillian Cube and Q.

We will take a close look at topics varying from polyglot services, orchestrated microservices to system scale testing. All are within reach.

And with full control; Let's add a dash of chaos!
